alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northern Gila County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:44PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms with heavy rainfall will impact portions of eastern Gila, southern Apache, and southern Navajo Counties through 345 PM MST... At 240 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of St. Johns to 10 miles west of Vernon to 11 miles southwest of Fort Apache. Movement was west at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, pea size hail, and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Show Low, Pinetop-lakeside, Taylor, St. Johns, Turkey Creek, Shumway, Fort Apache Reservation, Pinetop-lakeside, Linden, Lyman Lake State Park, Whiteriver, Carrizo, Cedar Creek, and Concho. This includes the following highways... State Route 277 near mile marker 336. State Route 260 between mile markers 322 and 368. State Route 473 between mile markers 2 and 10. State Route 77 between mile markers 343 and 361. State Route 73 between mile markers 311 and 357. Highway 180 191 between mile markers 371 and 380. Highway 60 between mile markers 305 and 368. Highway 191 161 between mile markers 316 and 342. Highway 180 between mile markers 337 and 368. State Route 61 between mile markers 353 and 381. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northern Gila County; White Mountains
